items.title: House Fellowship Manual – Weekly Files
items.big_idea: A curated, ready-to-use set of weekly house fellowship study guides (HTML + PDF). Open the index to browse all weeks.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 01: Ingratitude
items.big_idea: A pollutant is a harmful substance, when released into the environment, it brings undesired effects, adversely, unfavorably affects the usefulness of resources, ingratitude is an hazardous pollutant which should be kept out of our environment, ingrates disrupt the natural order, harmony amongst the brethrenzz5z . God hates ingrates because it contaminates o…

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 02: Watch Your Back
items.big_idea: In our present world, many are losing the battle of life as a result of care free life, uncontrolled desires has made many to end their mission on earth abruptly that is why God's presence for divine leading in any task or action, discipline and vigilance are needful to race through and end well.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 03: Not Over Yet
items.big_idea: Believers should have it at their mind that God decides when it is over, a condemned case of Lazarus with stinking dead body in John 11 received divine attention and reversal that is why you don't need to be discouraged in your challenging situation, know that God has good plan for you.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 04: Cancerous Cell Part 1
items.big_idea: The leaders should remind the members that challenges of life has expiring date but we need to trust God, our Redeemer knows what to do to those issues.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 05: Cancerous Cell Part 2
items.big_idea: The leaders should remind the members of what cancerous cell is and how to identify it.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 06: Very Important Thing.
items.big_idea: Father, grant all believers the consciousness of embracing very important things in their Christian journey.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 07: Betrayals Or Believers?
items.big_idea: Father, by your spirit expose all act of wickedness and betrayals in your vineyard.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 08: Buying Time
items.big_idea: The leaders should remind the members of lesson treated last week on the betrayals, their attributes and the need for believers to stand firm against their tricks.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 09: Eyes Have Not Seen
items.big_idea: “But as it is written, Eye hath not seen, nor ear heard, neither have entered into the heart of man, the things which God hath prepared for them that love him.” 1 Cor 2:9

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 10: The Power Of God'S Favour.
items.big_idea: The leaders should remind the members on last topic on eyes have not seen God's greater plan for His own.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 11: Loving God
items.big_idea: Father, let your unfailing love be multiplied in my heart today and always in Jesus name.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 12: Under New Management
items.big_idea: The leaders should remind the members on last week's discussion on loving God and rewards of loving God.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 13: Neighbourhood Evangelism
items.big_idea: Give a copy of house fellowship manual to souls around and also go out and win soul for Christ.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 14: God'S Megaphone
items.big_idea: Father, please don't let me lose my placement and relevance in your kingdom business in Jesus name.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 15: Account Balance
items.big_idea: The leaders should remind the members on last week topic on being God's mouth piece and the blessings attached to it.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 16: Beware Of Negative Influence
items.big_idea: The leaders should remind the members on last discussion on stewardship accountability

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 17: God Can Overrule.
items.big_idea: “I will overturn, overturn, overturn it and it shall be no more, until he comes whose right it is; and I will give it him”. Ezekiel 21:27.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 18: Prison Break?
items.big_idea: Father, blast into pieces on this day every prison enemy may be keeping lives and destiny of members of this house fellowship centre .

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 19: It Is Well
items.big_idea: The leaders should remind the members on lesson discussed on prison break that enemy's intentions on believers.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 20: Knowing The Mind Of God.
items.big_idea: “And he that searcheth the hearts knoweth what is the mind of the Spirit, because he maketh intercession for the saints according to the will of God”. Rom 8:27

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 21: The Encounter At Peniel.
items.big_idea: Father, give me special encounter that will increase my value and commitment in 2026.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 22: Arise, Shine
items.big_idea: The leaders should remind the members on last week lesson on an encounter in Peniel.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 23: Brokenness
items.big_idea: “The Lord is near unto them that are of a broken heart, and saveth such as be of a contrite spirit”. Psalm 34:18

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 24: Procastination
items.big_idea: Father, please help me to be diligent in whatever assignment being committed into my hands.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 25: Remember Vashti
items.big_idea: Whatever God has deposited in your life is for a purpose and you must ensure that you don't abuse it. We shall examine the life of a queen called Vashti and the consequences of her behavior.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 26: House Fellowship Awareness Day
items.big_idea: Hanging of House Fellowship Banners in Centres/ Exchange of Gifts as A Sign of Love and Unity.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 27: Dare To Be Different.
items.big_idea: Just as it is for a tree to be identified by its fruit, so it is for any generation of people to be identified by its character (Matthew 7:16-20). Every generation has its own uniqueness. Daniel refused to concur to devastating agenda to his future which later pave the way for his life of influence and affluence in a strange land.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 28: Make Your Life Count
items.big_idea: Jesus Christ lived a perfect life, His impact is everlasting. Phil.2:5-11. As His sons and daughters, we should live our lives to positively impact others for commitment, service, love and dedication to our God like Apostle Paul. 1 Cor.11:1. There is assurance of divine rewards now and when we meet in glory.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 29: Like A Roaring Lion
items.big_idea: The Holy Spirit in 1 Timothy 4:1-3 warns us that that there will be seducing spirits, evil doctrines, wiles of the devil all these are deplored seeking to derail believers from the path of truth. This is why Apostle Paul admonishes us in our memory verse to be sober and vigilant so that we will not fall prey to the devil's antics.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 30: Keeping Fit
items.big_idea: Keeping fit is the activity of keeping your body in good condition. This is very important as we need our bodies in good condition to accomplish life's goals and serve God effectively and flawlessly. Our daily activities should be anchored on spiritual development too, when your spirit is whole, your body will effect divine purpose.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 31: Idols
items.big_idea: idols are objects or persons that are not God but are worshipped as if they are God. People who worship idols are called idolaters. Examples of idols - shrines and evil altars.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 32: Zoe (God Kind Of Life)
items.big_idea: Zoe is a Greek word for life. Biblically, it is defined as “eternal life or God kind of life”. John 17:3. It means the rich abundant divine nature of God, His fullness of love, of joy, power and abilities. 1 John 5:2

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 33: The Compromised Believer
items.big_idea: The compromised believer is one who has turned back from following the Lord, given place to the devil and is now under his control. He has forsaken the way of the Lord and follows his own way. As a result, he is untrustworthy because the spirit influencing his actions is unholy. We shall be looking at biblical examples of compromised believers and how to av…

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 34: Beware Of Ravening Wolves
items.big_idea: False prophets (ravening wolves) are “so called prophets” who prophesy lies. They claim their prophecy is of God, but it is false. Their aim is to deceive people with their false prophesy by peaching destructive heresies amongst believers (2 Peter 2:1). These false prophets even show signs and wonders to deceive, if possible, the very elect (Matthew 24:24).…

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 35: Living In The End Time
items.big_idea: We are warned that difficult times shall signal the last days. If we look around us today, it is very clear that we are indeed in the last days because all the signs listed by Apostle Paul are happening now. As children of God who have the hope of reigning with Jesus, we should not be ignorant of this fact and should not be caught unawares or carried away w…

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 36: Whose Image Are You?
items.big_idea: This question is required in our daily lives, who are we representing, is Christ formed in us, are attributes of believers is it manifesting in our daily conduct? Are we Christians in church, demons in the world? Your relationship to others can it be spoken well of or deepening in ungodly way? May Almighty God give all leaders and members in our various cen…

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 37: Costly Mistakes
items.big_idea: Many believers have lost their birthright to worldly pleasures, leaving them under the servitude of the devil. At creation, every child of God has been endowed with spiritual gifts, inspirational abilities, access to divine treasures and provisions for endless celebration but due to negligence and life of indifference like Esau, many have become slaves to d…

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 38: Return On Investment
items.big_idea: God demands return on His investment on every of His creation, idleness, lack of diligence to God's purpose and agenda may incur His wrath, that is why bible says a diligent man will sit with kings and not ordinary people. God's input in His children must be rewarded with great harvest, a careless child of God, not ready to put the talents into use…

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 39: Neighbourhood CSR/Welfare
items.big_idea: Father, don't let any member of house fellowship unit miss your second coming.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 40: Companionship
items.big_idea: Many people enter marriage without pure knowledge of what it takes, wrong reasons for entering marriage has caused many to lose their lives, careers, health, ministries, businesses, family members, though God said it is not good for man to be alone, but many are still alone even in marriage, may Almighty God give us full understanding of what it takes to be…

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 41: Prepared Ahead
items.big_idea: The events that are happening all over the world are an indication of the end time. As believers, there is a need for us to prepare ahead by taking proactive steps to equip ourselves.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 42: Who Is A Winner?
items.big_idea: A winner is someone who lives according to God's principles and values. They are capable of walking in freedom and victory as stated in John 8:32 and 36. According to Genesis 1:26,27, God created us to succeed in every aspect of life - physically, spiritually, materially and beyond

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 43: Good Success
items.big_idea: Good success refers to achieving a desired goal while experiencing a sense of fulfilment and satisfaction. Moreover, good success encompasses moral and ethical integrity, meaning that one's accomplishments should provide value and benefits to all parties involved and ultimately bring glory to God.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 44: Sleep As A Gift
items.big_idea: The bible says in James 1:17 that every good gift and every perfect gift is from above, and cometh down from the Father of lights, with whom is no variableness, neither shadow of turning. Sleep is a good gift from God to mankind, sleep services all aspects of our bodies in one way or another. It affects both mental and physical health. Even spiritually, bec…

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 45: Abandoned?
items.big_idea: The word abandoned means to be deserted, forsaken, rejected, losing assistance, in this Christian race, many have lost hope, thinking suicide because people that supposed to bring encouragement to them are the one condemning them, increasing their wound instead of providing solution to quicken their healing, they are the one escalating their sorrow and grie…

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 46: Unhealthy Relationship
items.big_idea: Unhealthy relationship has maimed dreams of many innocent souls, even in our daily prints, we read of young ladies that have died untimely death to ritual killings, anger from their so called “boyfriend”, bible says in 1 Corinthians 15:33 that you should not be fooled by those who say such sweet things to your hearing, if you listen to them, cohabit with th…

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 47: Your Dressing
items.big_idea: The primary purpose of dressing is to cover ones nakedness and to glorify God. As children of God, we should let our dressing give glory to God. Our dressing is the first description of who we are. Our character is judged by our style of dressing.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 48: Pride
items.big_idea: One of the scheme of devil implanted in the heart of some end time believers is inability to know that they are exercising pride, many hearts are lifted in pride, through this hearts of mankind have rebelled against divine purpose, God's authority and knowledge, this is one of the tricks of the devil that many believers are falling into.

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 49: There Shall Be No Barrier
items.big_idea: The word barrier means a circumstance or obstacle that keeps people or things apart or prevents progress, it causes separation, obstruction to flawless passage. In Joshua 1:5, after the demise of Moses, the mantle of leadership fell on Joshua, with the barrier of fear on how to get the task done but thank to word of assurance from Almighty God that gave him…

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 50: Leave A Positive Mark
items.big_idea: And God wrought special miracles by the hands of Paul: so that from his body were brought unto the sick handkerchiefs or aprons, and the diseases departed from them, and the evil spirits went out of them. Acts 19:11-12. If you will be used by God to perform signs and wonders in these last days, and leaving positive landmark, you must have the heart of churc…

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 51: Angels Are Minstering Spirits
items.big_idea: God speaks to man in many ways, God could speak directly to man through dreams, visions and the gifts of Holy Spirit. He uses many agencies too. Among many agencies God uses to minister to man are the bible, circumstances, other believers and angels

items.title: House Fellowship Manual 2026 — Week 52: Welcome To Interractive Session And Love Feast
items.big_idea: The leader should write down suggestion for review and later bless centre members.
